metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48521 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in OpenDKIM through 2.10.3, and 2.11.x through 2.11.0-Beta2. It fails to keep track of ordinal numbers when removing fake Authentication-Results header fields, which allows a remote attacker to craft an e-mail message with a fake sender address such that programs that rely on Authentication-Results from OpenDKIM will treat the message as having a valid DKIM signature when in fact it has none.

criterions.comment: opendkim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
